fields.headline: The website
fields.bodyText: Thebettingsite.co.uk This new website is quite simply the answer to all desk-bound gamblers' dreams. By placing a minimum £5 bet you can watch the race of your choice, live on your computer screen, for no extra cost. There is full access to form (with a video archive of races to come shortly) and, with links to all major bookmakers, this is an essential tool for anyone serious about betting on racing. Subscriptions cost £15 a month (should you wish to watch races without betting that £5 minimum), or a single race costs £1. Happy punting.
